Package jwo.landserf.process.io

Classes that perform file input/output operations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BinRasterIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing binary raster files.
BinVectorIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading binary vector files.
FeatureStyle Stores a simple colour representation of a KML style that can be flagged to be associated with any combination of points, lines or areas.
FileHandler Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing files in a range of formats.
FileIO Superclass of all file IO classes.
ImageIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing image files.
KMZWriter Allows an image or collection of images to be written out as a single KMZ file for display in GoogleEarth and similar applications.
LandSerfIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing LandSerf format files.
MasterMapReader Reads in an Ordnance Survey MasterMap file in serial fashion using a SAX parser.
ShapefileIO Collection of methods for reading and writing ESRI shapefiles.
TextRasterIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing text raster files.
TextVectorIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing text vector files.
VrmlIO Contains a collection of static methods for writing VRML files.
XmlIO Contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing various XML format files.
 

Package jwo.landserf.process.io Description

Classes that perform file input/output operations.

Each class contains static methods for reading and writing files in various GIS and image formats. For file format information, see the 'Howto' guide at www.landserf.org.

Related Documentation

  • LandSerf home page
  • Java Programming for Spatial Sciences
Version 2.3, 1st December, 2008
